== Ubuntu In Action ==

This page contains a little bit about the book we are working on. Ubuntu In Action will be an intermediate to advanced technical book largely geared toward Ubuntu Server.

=== Bibliographic Information ===

* Title (tentative): Ubuntu In Action
* Authors: MattGalvin, JeffSchering and JeromeGotangco
* Publisher: Manning Press
* Publication Date: 2006, around the time of the Dapper release.
